short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily find and subscribe to RSS and RSSHub.
short.zh_CN: 轻松查找和订阅 RSS 和 RSSHub。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Discover and subscribe to the RSS feeds associated with the current page effortlessly.
- Explore and subscribe to the RSSHub supported by the current page promptly.
- Easily identify the RSSHubs supported by the current website quickly.
- Supports one-click RSS subscription for various platforms including Tiny Tiny RSS, Miniflux, FreshRSS, Feedly, Inoreader, Feedbin, The Old Reader, Feeds.Pub, Local Reader...

Open Sourced on GitHub: https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub-Radar

Made with ❤️ by DIYgod
long.zh_CN:
- 轻松地发现并订阅与当前页面相关的RSS源。
- 迅速探索并订阅当前页面支持的RSSHub。
- 快速识别当前网站支持的RSSHub。
- 支持一键式在各种平台上进行RSS订阅，包括 Tiny Tiny RSS、Miniflux、FreshRSS、Feedly、Inoreader、Feedbin、The Old Reader、Feeds.Pub 和 Local Reader...

在 GitHub 上开源：https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub-Radar

Made with ❤️ by DIYgod
